   Megaton had landed a few miles outside Maximal territory, he wasn't rea=
dy to quit trying  for his destiny. When the other Predacons saw how he got=
 the Maximals to side with him they'd have to accept him as leader. He hear=
d what sounded like thunder in the distance. He  placed his clawed hand ove=
r his spark, "Thank You" he said to whatever diety was responsible for such=
 a stroke of luck. 
  He transformed to dragon mode and flew back towards t=
he CF.
